item.title: [317] Head turns invisible when wearing Custom Phat
item.dc:creator: @Bill1 Bill_
item.description:
@Bill1 wrote:

Hells-History:

It’s a common glitch, just make sure the player is NOT wearing too many customs. Or this problem will happen.

Yes, that’s the perfect way to solve all your problems.

/sarcasm

item.source: [317] Head turns invisible when wearing Custom Phat

item.title: [317] Head turns invisible when wearing Custom Phat
item.dc:creator: @aekramer aekramer
item.description:
@aekramer wrote:

Allright so I don’t know if this is Server or Client sided, but, when I equip a custom Phat (Barrows etc) it makes the head go invisible like this:

But the weird thing is, first, when I added them they got into the wrong slot (Weapon slot) and the head was fine, nothing invisible or any, then I switched the slot to head, and now it goes to right slot, but the head dissappears…

Any help please? Or tell me if this is server sided, then I will post in other section

EDIT:
Here are the ints I used:

if(i == 6891){ //Barrows phat class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 10388; class8.anInt174 = 2635; class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt190 = 76; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 187; class8.anInt200 = 363; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.aString170 = "Barrows Party Hat"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Party Hat worn by the Barrows Brothers.".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
